reviewText:
But, I've not seen it! Entirely my fault, I didn't notice that I wouldn't be able to play this DVD. I'm sure it's terrific and I'm really sorry it won't play
in my region and it costs too much to send it back although they were happy to refund my money if I returned it. Anyway,
I need to pay more attention! Not their fault! They were most gracious and got right back to me. This was entirely MY PROBLEM, NOT THEIRS!
It showed 6 dance steps and then the dances set to music! Should be helpful! It was just what I wanted!
